message.content:
cs.LO, cs.PL, cs.FL, cs.DS, cs.SE 

The paper deals with proving non-termination of term rewriting systems, which is a topic in the area of logic and computation (cs.LO). The use of regular (tree) automata as certificates suggests a connection to formal languages and automata theory (cs.FL). The paper also involves the analysis of data structures (cs.DS) and software engineering techniques (cs.SE) for proving non-termination. Finally, the use of term rewriting systems suggests a connection to programming languages (cs.PL).
